languages.text: {n}Ваши поспешные усилия не пропадают даром — медицинские познания позволяют вам остановить несколько кровотечений и немного облегчить страдания секретаря.{/n} "Вам... не стоило тратить на меня свое время, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваши поспешные усилия не пропадают даром — медицинские познания позволяют вам остановить несколько кровотечений и немного облегчить страдания секретаря.{/n} "Вам... не стоило тратить на меня свое время, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши поспешные усилия не пропадают даром — медицинские познания позволяют вам остановить несколько кровотечений и немного облегчить страдания секретаря.{/n} "Вам... не стоило тратить на меня свое время, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your hasty efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Your hasty efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}素早い対応が功を奏した。メディケアとして得た知識のおかげで、何ヶ所かの傷口の出血を止めて、彼の痛みをいくらか和らげることができた。{/n}「私などのために…恐れ多いです、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}素早い対応が功を奏した。メディケアとして得た知識のおかげで、何ヶ所かの傷口の出血を止めて、彼の痛みをいくらか和らげることができた。{/n}「私などのために…恐れ多いです、陛下」

languages.text: {n}你的迅速包扎有了成效，顺利包扎好了几个流血的伤口，在某种程度上缓解了他的痛苦。{/n}“您……您本不该把时间浪费在我身上，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的迅速包扎有了成效，顺利包扎好了几个流血的伤口，在某种程度上缓解了他的痛苦。{/n}“您……您本不该把时间浪费在我身上，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Tus esfuerzos inmediatos dan fruto y tus conocimientos sobre la medicae te permiten detener la hemorragia en varios lugares y aliviar su dolor.{/n} «No... malgaste su tiempo conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus esfuerzos inmediatos dan fruto y tus conocimientos sobre la medicae te permiten detener la hemorragia en varios lugares y aliviar su dolor.{/n} «No... malgaste su tiempo conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Votre intervention rapide est récompensée : vos connaissances de medicae vous permettent d'arrêter plusieurs hémorragies et de réduire les douleurs d'Achilleas.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû perdre votre temps à me soigner, Votre Seigneurie... »
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre intervention rapide est récompensée : vos connaissances médicales vous permettent d'arrêter plusieurs hémorragies et de réduire les douleurs d'Achilleas.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû perdre votre temps à me soigner, Votre Seigneurie... »

languages.text: {n}Deine raschen Bemühungen zahlen sich aus: Durch deine Medicae-Kenntnisse kannst du die Blutungen in mehreren Bereichen stoppen und seinen Schmerz ein wenig lindern.{/n} "Ihr ... hättet Eure Zeit nicht mit mir verschwenden sollen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine raschen Bemühungen zahlen sich aus: Durch deine Medicae-Kenntnisse kannst du die Blutungen in mehreren Bereichen stoppen und seinen Schmerz ein wenig lindern.{/n} "Ihr ... hättet Eure Zeit nicht mit mir verschwenden sollen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}El çabukluğun işe yarıyor. Tıbbi bilgilerin sayesinde farklı bölgelerdeki kanamaları durduruyor ve çektiği acıyı bir nebze de olsa dindiriyorsun.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Lüzum yoktu, vaktinizi benim için heba ettiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Your fast efforts pay off: your knowledge of medicae allows you to stop the bleeding in several areas and somewhat ease his pain.{/n} "You... shouldn't have wasted your time on me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El çabukluğun işe yarıyor. Tıbbi bilgilerin sayesinde farklı bölgelerdeki kanamaları durduruyor ve çektiği acıyı bir nebze de olsa dindiriyorsun.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Lüzum yoktu, vaktinizi benim için heba ettiniz."
